document_data.mainbody:
ister Horta was a cannibalistic green hag who resided in the jungles of Samarach on the Chultan Peninsula in the late 14 century DR.
Sister Horta presented herself as an extremely old human female with sickly greenish skin. Her hark hair was greasy and tangled. like a barb bush.
Horta was a connoisseur of humanoid meats and a glutton for tender flesh. She enjoyed cracking bones of recently slain creatures and sucking out the marrow. That passion was shared with her three bodyguards. She also cooked her victims into a stew.
The hag was accompanied by three loyal burly club-wielding ogres who served as her bodyguards. Horta wore a powerful ring of wizardry.
Circa 1374 DR, Sister Horta wandered roads and jungle depths of Samarach, hunting for delicious humanoid victims. She sent her ogres to attack weaker and more tender creatures while avoiding more sizable and tougher play, claiming their flesh was as hard and unpalatable as a dinosaurs.
